infoSections.text: The **ESP32** is a powerful microcontroller with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, ideal for electronics development, IoT applications, and real-time signal processing. In neurotech, it enables wireless brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), remote biosignal monitoring, and low-power neural data transmission, making it a key tool for developing portable and connected neuroelectronic systems.
